definition: Yandu district of Yancheng city 鹽城市|盐城市[Yan2 cheng2 shi4], Jiangsu
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
Yandu district of Yancheng city 鹽城市|盐城市[Yan2 cheng2 shi4], Jiangsu

sentences.english: By the spring of 2005, the country had run out of DEC salt.
sentences.chinese: 到2005年春季，所有含DEC的鹽都賣光了。

sentences.english: Thirdly, it introduces the current economic situation and existing problem of YanDu district.
sentences.chinese: 隨後討論了鹽都區的經濟現狀及存在問題。

sentences.english: All of these samples of salt have the same fundamental properties .
sentences.chinese: 所有這些種類的鹽都具有相同的基本性質。

sentences.english: Next, puts forward tactics and proposals that Yandu District accepts related industry transfer.
sentences.chinese: 再次，提出鹽都區承接相關產業轉移的策略建議。

sentences.english: Sugar and salt are soluble in water.
Both sugar and salt can dissolve in water.
sentences.chinese: 糖和鹽都能在水中溶解。

sentences.english: Guyana imports all its salt from neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 圭亞那的鹽都是從鄰國進口的。
